casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Jose E. MEDINA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 12, 2017 James P. Sexton, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Harry Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 609 , 155 A.3d 285 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
